pageContext.claim: “If you look at farms over 15 years, before I got here, 15 years, they've been going down.”
pageContext.analysis: National net farm income, a key indicator of how well farmers are doing, has been declining since 2013 — meaning five, not 15, years. “U.S. farm income experienced a golden period during 2011 through 2014 due to strong commodity prices and robust agricultural exports,” according to the nonpartisan Congressional Research Service.
